00019         public class OutlookBar : Panel
00020         {
00021                 private int buttonHeight;
00022                 private int selectedBand;
00023                 private int selectedBandHeight;
00024 
00025                 public int ButtonHeight
00026                 {
00027                         get
00028                         {
00029                                 return buttonHeight;
00030                         }
00031 
00032                         set
00033                         {
00034                                 buttonHeight=value;
00035                                 // do recalc layout for entire bar
00036                         }
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 public int SelectedBand
00040                 {
00041                         get
00042                         {
00043                                 return selectedBand;
00044                         }
00045                         set
00046                         {
00047                                 SelectBand(value);
00048                         }
00049                 }
00050 
00051                 public OutlookBar()
00052                 {
00053                         buttonHeight=25;
00054                         selectedBand=0;
00055                         selectedBandHeight=0;
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 public void Initialize()
00059                 {
00060                         // parent must exist!
00061                         Parent.SizeChanged+=new EventHandler(SizeChangedEvent);
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 public void AddBand(string caption, ContentPanel content)
00065                 {
00066                         content.outlookBar=this;
00067                         int index=Controls.Count;
00068                         BandTagInfo bti=new BandTagInfo(this, index);
00069                         BandPanel bandPanel=new BandPanel(caption, content, bti);
00070                         Controls.Add(bandPanel);
00071                         UpdateBarInfo();
00072                         RecalcLayout(bandPanel, index);
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 public void SelectBand(int index)
00076                 {
00077                         selectedBand=index;
00078                         RedrawBands();
00079                 }
00080 
00081                 private void RedrawBands()
00082                 {
00083                         for (int i=0; i<Controls.Count; i++)
00084                         {
00085                                 BandPanel bp=Controls[i] as BandPanel;
00086                                 RecalcLayout(bp, i);
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089 
00090                 private void UpdateBarInfo()
00091                 {
00092                         selectedBandHeight=ClientRectangle.Height-(Controls.Count * buttonHeight);
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 private void RecalcLayout(BandPanel bandPanel, int index)
00096                 {
00097                         int vPos=(index <= selectedBand) ? buttonHeight*index : buttonHeight*index+selectedBandHeight;
00098                         int height=selectedBand==index ? selectedBandHeight+buttonHeight : buttonHeight;
00099 
00100                         // the band dimensions
00101                         bandPanel.Location=new Point(0, vPos);
00102                         bandPanel.Size=new Size(ClientRectangle.Width, height);
00103 
00104                         // the contained button dimensions
00105                         bandPanel.Controls[0].Location=new Point(0, 0);
00106                         bandPanel.Controls[0].Size=new Size(ClientRectangle.Width, buttonHeight);
00107 
00108                         // the contained content panel dimensions
00109                         bandPanel.Controls[1].Location=new Point(0, buttonHeight);
00110                         bandPanel.Controls[1].Size=new Size(ClientRectangle.Width-2, height-8);
00111                 }
00112 
00113                 private void SizeChangedEvent(object sender, EventArgs e)
00114                 {
00115                         Size=new Size(Size.Width, ((Control)sender).ClientRectangle.Size.Height-73);
00116                         UpdateBarInfo();
00117                         RedrawBands();
00118                 }
00119         }

00194                 public void AddIcon(string caption, Image image, EventHandler onClickEvent)
00195                 {
00196                         int index=Controls.Count/2;     // two entries per icon
00197                         PanelIcon panelIcon=new PanelIcon(this, image, index, onClickEvent);
00198                         Controls.Add(panelIcon);
00199 
00200                         Label label=new Label();
00201                         label.Text=caption;
00202                         label.Visible=true;
00203                         label.Location=new Point(0, margin+image.Size.Height+index*iconSpacing);
00204                         label.Size=new Size(Size.Width, 15);
00205                         label.TextAlign=ContentAlignment.TopCenter;
00206                         label.Click+=onClickEvent;
00207                         label.Tag=panelIcon;
00208                         Controls.Add(label);
00209                 }
00210         }

00212         public class PanelIcon : PictureBox
00213         {
00214                 public int index;
00215                 public IconPanel iconPanel;
00216 
00217                 private Color bckgColor;
00218                 private bool mouseEnter;
00219 
00220                 public int Index
00221                 {
00222                         get
00223                         {
00224                                 return index;
00225                         }
00226                 }
00227 
00228 
00229                 public PanelIcon(IconPanel parent, Image image, int index, EventHandler onClickEvent)
00230                 {
00231                         this.index=index;
00232                         this.iconPanel=parent;
00233                         Image=image;
00234                         Visible=true;
00235                         Location=new Point(iconPanel.outlookBar.Size.Width/2-image.Size.Width/2,
00236                                                         iconPanel.Margin + index*iconPanel.IconSpacing);
00237                         Size=image.Size;
00238                         Click+=onClickEvent;
00239                         Tag=this;
00240 
00241                         MouseEnter+=new EventHandler(OnMouseEnter);
00242                         MouseLeave+=new EventHandler(OnMouseLeave);
00243                         MouseMove+=new MouseEventHandler(OnMouseMove);
00244 
00245                         bckgColor=iconPanel.BackColor;
00246                         mouseEnter=false;
00247                 }
00248 
00249                 private void OnMouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs args)
00250                 {
00251                         if ( (args.X < Size.Width-2) &&
00252                                 (args.Y < Size.Width-2) &&
00253                                 (!mouseEnter) )
00254                         {
00255                                 BackColor=Color.LightCyan;
00256                                 BorderStyle=BorderStyle.FixedSingle;
00257                                 Location=Location-new Size(1, 1);
00258                                 mouseEnter=true;
00259                         }
00260                 }
00261 
00262                 private void OnMouseEnter(object sender, EventArgs e)
00263                 {
00264                 }
00265 
00266                 private void OnMouseLeave(object sender, EventArgs e)
00267                 {
00268                         if (mouseEnter)
00269                         {
00270                                 BackColor=bckgColor;
00271                                 BorderStyle=BorderStyle.None;
00272                                 Location=Location+new Size(1, 1);
00273                                 mouseEnter=false;
00274                         }
00275                 }
00276         }
